title: StickerTalk Please Be Patient Bad Driver Vinyl Sticker, 10 inches by 3 inches
features: High quality vinyl stickers. Professionally made in the USA.

This carefully crafted product is a witty way to add some personality to your vehicle! It also makes the perfect gag gift!
